basics.name: Ronan Russel Andal
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Student pursuing a BA in computer science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with a GPA of 3.00. Currently balancing academic responsibilities with a part time job. Excited to learn from industry professionals and establish lasting connections in the computer science field.

work.summary: Tech-savvy Student Assistant providing support, customer service, and multitasking
highlights: Provided technical support to colleagues and assisted in troubleshootine common issues setup countless computers & projectors for meetings / events to be ready
Offered excellent customer service by greeting visitors, answering inquiries, and directing them to the appropriate resources
Demonstrated proficiency in using office software and technology tools, such as Microsoft Office Suite and project management software
Effectively managed multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environemtn, meeting deadlines and ensuring high-quality work
Enhanced customer satisfaction by providing attentive service and promptly addressing dinner needs
Maintained a clean and organized dining area, contributing to a pleasant environment for guests
Assisted in the setup and breakdown of events, ensuring  timely completion and smooth operations
Served hundreds of customers a day and gave each one my full attention, also memorized a handful of regulars' usual orders
Occasionally called upon to assist the tech department during busy periods.
Taught to order our stock for the week and did it for my team at times when she was too busy

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
